nodes.text: The Empire Strikes Back (French: L'Empire contre-attaque) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. The Empire Strikes Back was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on September 20, 2017.

The Rebels succeeded in destroying the Death Star, the Empire's most powerful weapon. But the fight continues! In their last battle, the dreaded Darth Vader felt the Force in one of them. And he is determined to find him…
